name: Just-A-Crush
description:
Ryan invites his best friend Elijah over to hang out. He has something important he wants to tell him. Will he have the courage to do so?

A short and sweet BL story with cute art by Basil!

An entry for the O2A2 (Again!) Jam! The challenge is to use only one of each asset and tell a story within 1000 words or less.
This is a kinetic visual novel. It is 999 words long. With 1 sprite, 1 background, 1 music track and 1 sound effect. 

Credits:

Story, writing and programming done by Foxpancakes.

Character design, sprite art and background art by Basil.

Proofreader and moral support: squidcolas

Music: Jahzzar.

SFX: Rental Sound.

Thank you so much for playing! <3
